description:
What was sold in Japan as the Nintendo 3DSâ„¢ downloadable title "Dot Eater" has now been revamped for the overseas market with additional volume and the new name of "Dot Runner: Complete Edition." 50 new stages have been added for an impressive total of 100 stages of content.

With war raging, can BOLT defeat the boss of the Yakkini-ku Corps, Chop Suey?
name: Dot Runner: Complete Edition
